channel.title: Character file resets
channel.description: Whenever I log in, my account file for an existing account gets deleted and replaced with a brand new account automatically. i am using an delta 317 [ Demise Souce + Client ]. any help is appreciated :)

item.title: Character file resets
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

it saves, it just makes a brand new acocunt upon every log-in, if it is anti-leech, then any way to fix?
EDIT: it says when i log-in, “creating character file, try logging in again”, and there wasnt any other anti-leech on the source, which leads me to believe the source is just making a new account on every log-in instead of just the first. Any help is appreciated again.

Read full topic

item.title: Character file resets
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Possibly an anti-leech.
Or you need to make a player saving method, for when you log-out.

Read full topic
